org.trianacode.gui.main.imp

Class MainTrianaTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel

              • org.trianacode.gui.main.imp.TrianaTask
                • org.trianacode.gui.main.imp.MainTrianaTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, TrianaColorConstants, TaskComponent, TaskListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DaxFileTrianaTask, IWIRControlTrianaTask, ShiwaConfigTrianaTask

    public class MainTrianaTask
extends TrianaTask
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    MainTrianaTask is a class which creates the a Triana Icon consisting of a set of input nodes and output nodes.

    A MainTrianaTask is TrianaTool which is a JPanel, which is a Container, which is a JComponent and therefore has the ability to ommit event to the relevant listeners. MainTrianaTask contains two Vectors (in java.util) to store the pointers to the TrianaNode Objects. Vector can be increased and decreased in size.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
